titles.title: To amend the Small Business Act to reduce the interest rates on disaster loans provided by the Small Business Administration for losses resulting from flooding in Midwest communities participating in the national flood insurance program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.
Referred to the Subcommittee on SBA Legislation and the General Economy.

committee.name: House Small Business
committee.subcommittee: SBA Legislation and the General Economy

bill.summary: 7/21/1993--Introduced. Amends the Small Business Act to reduce to one percent per year (currently, varying amounts of up to eight percent) the interest rate on the Federal share of disaster loans provided by the Small Business Administration for losses resulting from flooding in Midwest communities during the period beginning on June 1, 1993, and ending on May 31, 1994, for communities that are participants in the national flood insurance program.
